full_description:
Astrum SN88 Wireless Bluetooth IP67 Sport Smart Watch

The Astrum SN88 Sport Smart Watch is compatible with smartphones running Android and iOS. Download the "YFit" APP and use your smartphone to manage the wristwatch, as well as reject incoming calls, receive incoming calls, texts, and APP notifications; this watch will never let you miss an essential item. Walking, running, cycling, climbing, swimming, football, basketball, rope skipping, badminton, and yoga are all supported by this wristwatch. Record all-day activities such as active time, steps, distance, calories burnt, and heart rate accurately. The breath training function allows you to take deep breaths and try to relax, which might help you relieve stress at work or in everyday life. The Astrum SN88 Sport Smart Watch monitors your heart rate and blood oxygen levels in real-time and stores past data. This wristwatch is always concerned about your health and assists you in maintaining the appropriate heart rate target zone for your workout objective. A sedentary reminder urges you to get up and move about more often to prevent sitting for lengthy periods. Furthermore, this watch can give a full analysis of your sleep quality (sleeping duration, deep sleep, light sleep), as well as a handy way to look through past data. This watch can assist you in developing a better lifestyle. The Astrum SN88 Sport Smart Watch comes with a built-in 200mAh polymer lithium battery. Comes with a magnetic USB charging cable for convenient and reliable charging anywhere you are as long as you can connect it. The Astrum SN88 Sport Smart Watch has a high waterproof level, making it perfect for swimming and daily life activities such as washing one's face, washing one's hands, being caught in the rain, and so on. Not suitable for use with hot water or in a hot sauna. This wristwatch also has a water drink reminder, music control, BT camera, alarm clock, stopwatch, adjustable brightness, weather, two-way search, and other useful functions. The 1.28-inch touch screen and simple yet attractive design of this smartwatch make it simple to use. This watch has several appearances you like, meet varied demands of different settings, and has various dials that can represent everyday usage and sports style. The silicone strap is soft and gentle on the skin, and it is simple to replace the 22mm universal strap. The Astrum SN88 Sport Smart Watch comes with no warranty.
